description: Try our easy to follow Bolognaise Pot Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bolognaise Pot Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, capsicum and pancetta. Cook for 8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until soft. Add mince, stirring to break up, until browned. Stir in paste, sauce and water. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes or until thick. Remove from heat. Stir in basil.
Divide bolognaise between 4 x 11/3 cupcapacity ramekin dishes.
Using 2 sheets of filo, cut each filo in half crossways. Spray with oil. Scrunch filo and arrange on top of bolognaise. Repeat to cover each pie. Place dishes onto a tray.
Bake for 15 minutes or until filo is golden and crisp. Serve.
